description: Branded HTML email notification for FormBridge contact form submissions

placeholder_descriptions.name: Submitter's name (string, max 100 chars)
placeholder_descriptions.excerpt: First ~240 characters of message with newlines stripped (preview in email)
placeholder_descriptions.page: URL or page name where form was submitted
placeholder_descriptions.ts: ISO 8601 timestamp when submission was received (e.g., '2025-11-05T14:30:00Z')
placeholder_descriptions.dashboard_url: Link to analytics dashboard or documentation (HTTPS URL)
placeholder_descriptions.brand_logo_url: HTTPS URL to logo image, preferably SVG or PNG (must be publicly accessible)
placeholder_descriptions.brand_primary_hex: Primary brand color in hex format (e.g., '#6D28D9')

rendering_notes.gradient_support: Supported in most modern email clients, graceful degradation for older clients
rendering_notes.image_hosting: All images must be HTTPS URLs hosted externally (recommend GitHub Pages or CDN)
rendering_notes.local_development: Use MailHog SMTP for local testing with full HTML rendering
